translations: v.牵引，拖曳（tow 的现在分词形式）

phrs.translation: 拖曳水池；船模试验槽；船模试验池

sentences.sentence: A haulage truck is towing our bus.
sentences.translation: 一辆拖车正托运我们的巴士。

sentences.sentence: To test their ability to identify eddies, the researchers again used the MIT Towing Tank.
sentences.translation: 为了测试发现涡流的能力，研究者再次使用了MIT的牵索水箱。

sentences.sentence: The owner will have to pay 525 rand (37 pounds) per vehicle in towing and storage fees, police said.
sentences.translation: 警方同时还指出，那些被扣押的车辆的所有者将会按照每辆车525兰特（37英镑）的标准来缴纳拖车费和车辆保管费。
